overview: Canada, present day. Yevhen is an international student from Ukraine, who receives a phone call from his father in the middle of the exam. His home country is being invaded by the neighbouring country, and his dad is stuck in the middle of it all. Their phone call that was meant to be a typical "check-in" between the son and father quickly turns into a very emotional challenge for both of them, as they slowly realize that this conversation might be their last.
title: Father (Батько)
